options.content:
Individual Flows per Country
  • This dashboard shows per-flow level data, given a particular source and destination country.
  • The table shows the volume, rate, duration (in hours, minutes and seconds) and retransmits for each flow.
  • Click on the timestamp of an individual flow to show more detailed information about that flow.
  • All times are displayed in browser local time.

targets.query: meta.src_country_name:$src AND meta.dst_country_name:$dest AND meta.sensor_id:$sensors AND meta.flow_type:$flow_type AND meta.src.community:$community AND ((!(_exists_:meta.is_network_testing)) OR meta.is_network_testing:no OR meta.is_network_testing:$is_net_test)

options.content: NetSage Sensors Observing Selected Country Flows

targets.query: ((meta.src_country_name:$src AND meta.dst_country_name:$dest) OR (meta.src_country_name:$dest AND meta.dst_country_name:$src)) AND (meta.src.community:$community OR meta.dst.community:$community) AND meta.sensor_id:$sensors AND ((!(_exists_:meta.is_network_testing)) OR meta.is_network_testing:no OR meta.is_network_testing:$is_net_test)

options.content: Questions, concerns, or other issues: epoc@tacc.utexas.edu NetSage Data Policy
